description:
Usopp manages to knock Sugar out and Operation SOP is accomplished! The toys in Dressrosa start turning back to their original forms and the people are slowly realizing who Doflamingo really is! In the meantime, the legendary hero Kyros reverts to his true form - and this mighty champion of the Colosseum has a score to settle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu Fukkatsu! Kyros Konshin no Ichigeki
La légende renaît. Kyros s’élance à corps perdu
The Legend Is Back! Kyros` All-out Blow!
伝説復活! キュロス渾身の一撃
